titleInfo.title: 'General View from R.I.M.S. Hardinge,Lingah.' Photographer: Unknown

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:201 x 289 mmCondition:The print is in good condition, though the mounting paper is heavily foxed and crumbling.Foliation:‘8’Process:Silver gelatin

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View from on board R.I.M.S. Hardinge,looking towards Lingah [Lingeh]. Four dhows are anchored off the coast while the town of Lingah is visible along the horizon.Inscriptions:Ink, below image: 'General View from R.I.M.S. Hardinge, Lingah.'
